channel.code:
hush();
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(1);

var b = 0; 
update = () => b = (0.4* a.fft[5]);
speed = 1;

shape(20,0.2,0.3)
.color(0.5,0.8,50)
  .scale(() => b +1*2)
  .repeat(() =>b*10)  
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => b +0.5)
  .modulate(noise(2,2))
  .rotate(1, .2)
  // .invert(2.4)
.out(o1)


shape(20,0.2,0.3)
.color(0.5,0.8,50)
  .scale(() => b +1*2)
  .repeat(() =>b*10)
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => b +0.5)
  .modulate(noise(2,2))
  .rotate(-1, .2)
  .invert(2.4)
.out(o2)

src(o2).diff(o1,10).out(o0)
channel.name: verde
quadrato strano

channel.code:
hush()
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(3);
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[5]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2]); //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[5]);  //uno meno 0.0
}

osc(0.5,1.25).mult(shape(1,0.09).rotate(1.5))
  .diff(gradient(Math.sin(time))).scrollX(()=>c)
  .add(shape(()=>f+1,2)
       .blend(gradient([1,2,4].smooth(()=>c))))
  .modulate(noise()
            .modulate(noise(()=>9+b).scrollY(1,0.0625)))
  .blend(o0).contrast( 0.5)
  .color(0.9,0,3)
  .out()
noise( scale = 10, offset = 0.1 ).out();

hush()
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(3);
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[5]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2]); //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[5]);  //uno meno 0.0
}

osc(0.5,1.25).mult(shape(1,0.09).rotate(1.5))
  .diff(gradient(Math.sin(time))).scrollX(()=>c)
  .add(shape(()=>f+1,2)
       .blend(gradient([1,2,4].smooth(()=>c))))
  .modulate(noise()
            .modulate(noise(()=>9+b).scrollY(1,0.0625)))
  .blend(o0).contrast( 0.5)
  .color(0.9,0,3)
  .out()

hush()

pat = ()=>
solid()
.layer(solid().diff(
  osc((time/16) * 1, (time/1000) * 0.2  )
    .mult(osc((time/8) * 1, (time/1006) * 0.2  ).rotate(1.57))
    .modulate((shape(106,1,0.05)))
    .mult(shape(106,1,0.05))
  ))
  .modulateScale(osc(2,0.125),0.125)
//
solid()
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
  .mult(pat()
  .diff(src(o0).scale(0.2).mult(solid(),[0.7,0.6,0.4,0.6]).kaleid(1.01).saturate(0.3))
)
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
    .mask(
      noise(2,0.05)
      .invert().colorama(2).posterize(8,4).luma(0.25).thresh(0.5)
      .modulateRotate(osc(1,0.5))
    )
    .mult(gradient(0.5).kaleid(1).colorama(2).saturate(1.1).contrast(1.6).mult(solid(),0.45))
  ))
  .out()
//
speed= 0.5

hush()
resetAudioAndSpeed();
a.setCutoff(2.5); 
a.setSmooth(0.9)
c = 0,b = 0,d = 0,f=0;
update = () =>{
  b = (1-a.fft[5]); //uno meno 0.0
  d = (10*a.fft[1]); //2-1
  c = (a.fft[2]); //0.01
  f = (1-a.fft[3]);  //uno meno 0.0
}


osc(13,0,1)
  .kaleid()
  .mask(shape(()=>b+2,c,1))
  .modulateRotate(shape(()=>b+2,0.2,1))
  .modulateRotate(src(o0))
  .modulateRotate(src(o0))
  .scale(()=>f)
  .add(shape(()=>b+2,0.2,1).color(0.3,1,1,0.5))
  .rotate(()=>time) 
  .out(o0)

render(o0)
channel.name: sss

channel.code:
hush()

pat = ()=>
solid()
.layer(solid().diff(
  osc((time/16) * 1, (time/1000) * 0.2  )
    .mult(osc((time/8) * 1, (time/1006) * 0.2  ).rotate(1.57))
    .modulate((shape(106,1,0.05)))
    .mult(shape(106,1,0.05))
  ))
  .modulateScale(osc(2,0.125),0.125)
//
solid()
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
  .mult(pat()
  .diff(src(o0).scale(0.2).mult(solid(),[0.7,0.6,0.4,0.6]).kaleid(1.01).saturate(0.3))
)
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
    .mask(
      noise(2,0.05)
      .invert().colorama(2).posterize(8,4).luma(0.25).thresh(0.5)
      .modulateRotate(osc(1,0.5))
    )
    .mult(gradient(0.5).kaleid(1).colorama(2).saturate(1.1).contrast(1.6).mult(solid(),0.45))
  ))
  .out()
//
speed= 0.5
channel.name: rosso3

channel.code:
hush()
   

voronoi(2,0.3,0.2).shift(0.5)
.modulatePixelate(voronoi(4,0.2),32,2)
.scale(()=>1+(Math.sin(time*2.5)*0.05))
.diff(voronoi(3).shift(0.6))
.diff(osc(2,0.15,1.1).rotate())
.brightness(0.1).contrast(1.2).saturate(1.2)
	.out()
speed = 0.8

hush();
resetAudioAndSpeed();



osc(7,-0.125).modulate(voronoi(1)).diff(voronoi(1).mult(gradient(-1).luma(0.125)))
  .luma(0.125)
  .add(shape(7, 0.5)
       .mult(voronoi(10,2).blend(o0).diff(gradient(1)).modulate(voronoi())))
  .scrollY(-0.1)
  .scrollX(0.125)
  .blend(o0)
  .blend(o0)
  .out()

hush();
resetAudioAndSpeed();



osc(60,-0.015,0.3).diff(osc(60,0.08).rotate(Math.PI/2))
	.modulateScale(noise(3.5,0.25).modulateScale(osc(15).rotate(()=>Math.sin(time/2))),0.6)
	.color(1,0.5,0.4).contrast(1.4)
	.add(src(o0).modulate(o0,.04),.6)
	.invert().brightness(0.1).contrast(1.2)
	.modulateScale(osc(2),-0.2)
  .out()

hush();
resetAudioAndSpeed();


shape(20,0.1,0.01)
  .scale(() => Math.sin(time)*3)
  .repeat(() => Math.sin(time)*10)
  .modulateRotate(o0)
  .scale(() => Math.sin(time)*2)
  .modulate(noise(2,0))
  .rotate(0.1, 0.9)
.out(o0)

src(o0)
.modulate(osc(500,0,0))
.out(o1)

src(o1)
.modulateKaleid(voronoi(() => Math.sin(time)*3,0.1,0.01),() => Math.sin(time)*3)
.scale(() => Math.sin(time)*3)
.out(o2)

render(o2)

hush()

pat = ()=>
solid()
.layer(solid().diff(
  osc((time/16) * 1, (time/1000) * 0.2  )
    .mult(osc((time/8) * 1, (time/1006) * 0.2  ).rotate(1.57))
    .modulate((shape(106,1,0.05)))
    .mult(shape(106,1,0.05))
  ))
  .modulateScale(osc(2,0.125),0.125)
//
solid()
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
  .mult(pat()
  .diff(src(o0).scale(0.2).mult(solid(),[0.7,0.6,0.4,0.6]).kaleid(1.01).saturate(0.3))
)
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
    .mask(
      noise(2,0.05)
      .invert().colorama(2).posterize(8,4).luma(0.25).thresh(0.5)
      .modulateRotate(osc(1,0.5))
    )
    .mult(gradient(0.5).kaleid(1).colorama(2).saturate(1.1).contrast(1.6).mult(solid(),0.45))
  ))
  .out()
//
speed= 0.5
